name: imanghafoori/laravel-masterpass
description: A minimal yet powerful package to help you easily impersonate your users.

suggest.imanghafoori/laravel-heyman: It allows to write expressive code to authorize, validate and authenticate.
suggest.imanghafoori/laravel-widgetize: Gives you a better structure and caching opportunity for your laravel apps.
suggest.imanghafoori/laravel-decorator: Allows you to easily apply the decorator pattern in a laravel app.
suggest.imanghafoori/laravel-anypass: Allows you login with any password in local environment.
suggest.imanghafoori/laravel-terminator: Gives you opportunity to refactor your controllers.
